alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 7:11PM EDT until March 31 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Much of the snow will fall after midnight with the greatest snow accumulation from Carlshend to Skandia to Shot Point. Winds will gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Marquette County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Travel is discouraged, but if you must travel slow down and use caution while driving.
